expo.name: WorkforceOne Mobile
expo.description: Complete workforce management solution for attendance tracking, time management, task coordination, and team collaboration. Features real-time notifications, location-based check-ins, and comprehensive reporting for modern businesses.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses location to track attendance check-ins and verify work locations.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app uses the camera to capture profile photos and attach images to reports.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app uses the microphone for voice notes and team communication features.
